mapper.select: SELECT mov_title, mov_titleEng, mov_director, mov_actor, mov_date, mov_posterURL, mov_state, mov_dday, mov_nation, mov_runtime, mov_intro, mov_rating, mov_genre FROM movie WHERE use_flag = 'Y' and mov_no = #{mov_no}

SELECT rev.rev_no, m.mem_no, m.mem_name, rev.rev_rating, rev.rev_content, DATE_FORMAT(rev.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i(%p)') AS reg_date FROM review rev JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = rev.mem_no WHERE rev.use_flag = 'Y' and rev.mov_no = #{mov_no} ORDER BY rev.reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review( mem_no, mov_no, rev_rating, rev_content, use_flag, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES( #{mem_no}, #{mov_no}, #{rev_rating}, #{rev_content}, 'Y', now(), now() )
